participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

SESC_01.Description: Conversion of highest grade completed to Hollingshead Education Code based on Look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

Levels.5: 5-Partial college (at least one year or specialized training)

SESC_02.Description: Self-reported highest grade completed by child’s mother or guardian #1.

SESC_03.Description: Conversion of highest job title/description to Hollingshead Occupational Code based on look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

Levels.1: 1- Farm laborers, menial service workers (dependent on welfare, no regular occupation)
Levels.4: 4- Smaller business owners (<$25,000), skilled manual laborers, craftsmen, tenant farmers
Levels.5: 5- Clerical and sales workers, small farm and business owners (business valued at $25,000-$50,000)
Levels.6: 6- Technicians, semi-professionals, small business owners (business valued at $50,000-$70,000)
Levels.7: 7- Smaller business owners, farm owners, managers, minor professionals
Levels.8: 8- Administrators, lesser professionals, proprietor of medium-sized business
Levels.9: 9- Higher executive; proprietor of large businesses, major professional

SESC_04.Description: Self-reported highest job title/description held by participant’s mother or guardian #1.

SESC_05.Description: Conversion of highest grade completed to Hollingshead Education Code based on Look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

Levels.5: 5- Partial college (at least one year or specialized training)

SESC_06.Description: Self-reported highest grade completed by child’s father or guardian #2.

SESC_07.Description: Conversion of highest job title/description to Hollingshead Occupational Code based on look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

Levels.1: 1- Farm laborers, menial service workers (dependent on welfare, no regular occupation)
Levels.4: 4- Smaller business owners (<$25,000), skilled manual laborers, craftsmen, tenant farmers
Levels.5: 5- Clerical and sales workers, small farm and business owners (business valued at $25,000-$50,000)
Levels.6: 6- Technicians, semi-professionals, small business owners (business valued at $50,000-$70,000)
Levels.7: 7- Smaller business owners, farm owners, managers, minor professionals
Levels.8: 8- Administrators, lesser professionals, proprietor of medium-sized business
Levels.9: 9- Higher executive; proprietor of large businesses, major professional

SESC_08.Description: Conversion of highest job title/description to Hollingshead Occupational Code based on look up tables in Hollingshead, 1975.

SESC_09.Description: ([(Maternal/Guardian #1 Occupational Code x 5) + (Maternal/Guardian #1 Education Code x 3)] + [(Paternal/Guardian #2 Occupational Code x5) + (Paternal/Guardian #2 Education Code x 3)])/2

SESC_10.Description: Current grade child participant is in as reported by parent/guardian.
